function.name: edit_user_profile
function.description: Edit the profile (Information contained in the CV) of a user. The function will edit the default profile of the user that must have been read before. It will then generate a new CV with the new profile.

new_profile_name.description: The name of the new profile. Should reflect the changes made to the profile. And be unique

path.description: The path to the field to edit in the profile. Should match the keys in the profile json.

operation.description: The operation to apply to the field. Can be 'insert', 'replace', 'delete'

value.description: The value to insert in the field. Only required for 'insert' and 'replace' operations

edits.description: The edits to apply to the profile

function.name: search_jobs
function.description: Search the website Indeed for job offers. Ranked by newest first.

search_query.description: Any information helpful to find jobs to help the user

location.description: The location where the jobs should be located. Example: Paris (75)

num_results.description: Number of results that the query should return. Default to 15 (one request)

function.name: get_job_details
function.description: Get additional information about a job offer. Such as the detailed description. And how to apply, and more

job_title.description: Job title must be one of the titles of the jobs previously returned by the search_jobs function.

function.name: list_job_titles
function.description: List the job titles available to look for additional details.

function.name: talk
function.description: Talk to the user. The user will respond to your messages.

message.description: The message to send to the user. Use Markdown to format the message.
